document_data.name: Guardian of Faith
document_data.level5e: {{Spell table|edition=5e|[[Celestial patron|Celestial]]|4|[[Cleric]]|4|[[Crown oath|Crown]]|4|[[Devotion oath|Devotion]]|4|[[Life domain|Life]]|4|[[Light domain|Light]]|4}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Guardian of faith''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[conjuration]] spell that summoned a spectral guardian that prevented hostile creatures from approaching it.
document_data.Effects: The spell created a large indistinct guardian that could be identified only by the presence of the symbol of its caster's [[deity]] on its shield. It lasted for eight hours and damaged any hostile creature that approached it. The guardian could be damaged and even destroyed if attacked with sufficient power.
document_data.Components: The spell needed only a [[verbal component]] to be cast.
